item.description:
We will likely be in the back room again, so be sure to check there. I'll have a sign on the door.

The defalt plan is more interesting conversation over dinner/coffee. However, if any of you have a specific topic you'd like to discuss let me know and/or just bring it up -- the private room allows for a whole-group discussion.

Default location of Trident Cafe, 7:30 March. 8. Please post or email if this date/time or venue don't work for you.
item.name: The Boston Transhumanism March Meetup
